DOC.detailed_description: We propose cross-sectional study among 150 woman United States use Internet date site past year order examine risk factor high-risk HPV infection 18-24 year old online daters , evaluate strategy transport store self-collected sample HPV test . We ask participant complete write questionnaire health , sexual behavior , attitude toward self-collecting vaginal swab , HPV vaccination , cervical cancer screening . Also , ask woman self-collect two sequential vaginal swab sample transport stored accord two strategy describe . Each sample test type-specific HPV DNA use PCR-based assay .
